1 Day Jungle Trail, Hot Springs and Cave

Quick Facts

Price: THB 1,900

Duration: X hours

Meal(s): Any meals mentioned as being included?

Difficulty: Experience? All levels?

Seasonal: November - February

More Info

Pick Up & Drop Off

Pick up around 6:00 to 6:30, arrive back in Chiang Mai around 20:00.

Included

Transport, guide, meals, water, and park fees.

Not Included

Extra snacks or soft drinks.

What to Bring

Wear shoes with grip suitable for trekking and climbing? Pack a warm layer for the chill? Need swimsuit for a waterfall?
